title: Guest Check-out and Payment
description: A guest is at the front desk to check out and settle their bill.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the correct guest bill.

tasks.description: Review the charges with the guest and confirm they are correct.
tasks.expected_outcome: The guest agrees to all charges on the folio.

tasks.description: Process the final payment using the credit card on file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the payment and provides the guest with a final receipt.

tasks.description: Update the room status to 'Vacant/Dirty' in the PMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The room status is updated, notifying housekeeping.
